title: RealDefense SUPERAntiSpyware Exposed Dangerous Function Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of RealDefense SUPERAntiSpyware. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the SAS Core Service. The issue results from an exposed dangerous function. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
timeline:
2025-09-04 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-12-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-12-19 - Advisory Updated
